Warning Wall of Deals Below Featuring our new SSD Cached KVM servers, and SSD Cached OpenVZ Servers.

Happy New Year to my Asian Customers who get to celebrate a for a month, these deals will help with the hangovers!

We have been in business for nearly 2 years with very favorable comments on our various offers on LET, and LEB.

**Offer Expires Jan 31**

Front Range Hosting is a VPS hosting company based in Colorado Springs Colorado
Our VPS Servers are Supermicro Built with Xeon E5 Series Processors
Our VPS Servers utilize LSI CacheCade SSD Acceleration, disk space with the speed of SSD's!
Our network, power, and HVAC is fully redundant, and our servers are hosted in a secure datacenter in Downtown Colorado Springs Colorado

KVM/OpenVZ Plans Come with Many Popular ISO's and Templates *Nix *bsd's only.  ISO's added on request.

Pricing on 4 OpenVZ plans below are inclusive of the FRH40 code.  Code applies to all VPS Price levels.

Memory Format is as follows:  Dedicated/Burst/vSwap 

**How is VSwap Calculated?**
VSwap is calculated from the amount of burst memory you add to a virtual server. For example, if you specify 512MB Ram and 1024MB Burst the VSwap would be 512MB (1024MB - 512MB = 512MB).

**REMEMBER! Prices are discounted after you click "Add to Cart"**
